message: Let's split it 60/40. A fair deal for us both to kick things off.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I think a 52.5/47.5 split is more reflective of the diminishing returns we face with each round. Let's close this out and secure our gains!
Bob, time is running out. I'm willing to meet you closer to the middle with a 55/45 split. Let's be sensible and take this deal.
